tool_description: Authenticates with cloud providers and generates access tokens for resource provisioning across AWS, Azure, GCP, and DigitalOcean.

provider.description: Cloud provider name: aws, azure, gcp, digitalocean

access_key.description: Provider access key or client ID

secret_key.description: Provider secret key or client secret

error_messages: Invalid provider: Use one of [aws, azure, gcp, digitalocean].

Session duration out of range: Must be between 900 and 43200 seconds.
usage: Provide cloud provider credentials and target region. The tool returns authentication tokens for subsequent API calls.

provider_endpoint.description: API endpoint URL for the provider
